adjectives.description: penniform (comparative more penniform, superlative most penniform)

examples: Penniform symbols were inscribed on the wall of the cave.

entries.meaning: (archaeology) A symbol that is shaped like a feather.
examples: Even in the palaeolithic periods symbols abound such as cup markings, tectiforms, penniforms, groups of dots, rectangles, lattice designs, symbolic vulvas, and so on.
